topic.title: Patient Location In Vehicle - conformance rules

lines.i: Patient's location in a vehicle during a vehicle collision

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.55"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11160)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67498-6" Location of patient in vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10120)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet VehiclePassengerLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:10121)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.06
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11160)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67498-6" Location of patient in vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10120)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet VehiclePassengerLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:10121)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.06
